title: After occupation of rehabilitation tenement, if any hutment dweller reconstructs or occupies any new hutment or structure; such unauthorized structure shall immediately be evicted and demolished by the C
clause_text: After occupation of rehabilitation tenement, if any hutment dweller reconstructs or occupies any new hutment or structure; such unauthorized structure shall immediately be evicted and demolished by the C.E.O., S.R.A. without giving prior notice.
section: In respect of those eligible hutment-dwellers who are not willing to join the S.R.S., the following steps shall be taken :-
